metadata.name: The Colour of Soup
metadata.description:
This piece shows how I experience colours when I close my eyes.

This piece is about the soup of colour one experiences every day.
Created during NFT summer.
I felt part of a community and how the community ebbed and flowed.

"The Colour of Soup"

841 px× 595px

This is an original piece of art, created and expressed by artist Harry G.B. Crabtree, using permanent markers on cold-pressed watercolour paper.
© 2022 Harry George Barker Crabtree
